channel.title: Please, help me with a shop
channel.description:
so when i try to trade the npc that sells the helmet's i disconnect. here's what i have [code]shop = 57 Helmet Shop 7534 100 14860 100 14634 100 14635 100 14636 100 3755 100 1959 100 3749 100 3755 100 3751 100 7594 100[/code] and here's one that work's [code]shop = 58 Kalphite Food Shop 2 2 391 10000 [/code]
whats the difference maybe the [code]2 2[/code] and here's the wanneshop of the food shop [code] } else if (NPCID == 551) { // Kalphite Food Store PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 58; // Kalphite Food Store[/code] and of the helmet shop [code] } else if (NPCID == 527) { // helmet shop by Confusing Coder PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 57;[/code]
so this is all. help please

item.title: Please, help me with a shop

Its the 2 2 [br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 02, 2009, 03:06:18 pm[/size][hr][quote=“server needer, post:1, topic:270791”]shop = 57 Helmet Shop 2 2 7534 100 14860 100 14634 100 14635 100 14636 100 3755 100 1959 100 3749 100 3755 100 3751 100 7594 100[/quote]

so when i try to trade the npc
that sells the helmet’s i disconnect.
here’s what i have

shop = 57	Helmet Shop				7534	100	14860	100	14634	100	14635	100	14636	100	3755	100	1959	100	3749	100	3755	100	3751	100	7594	100

and here’s one that work’s

shop = 58	Kalphite Food Shop			2	2	391	10000

whats the difference maybe the 2 2
and here’s the wanneshop of the food shop

} else if (NPCID == 551) { // Kalphite Food Store PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 58; // Kalphite Food Store
and of the helmet shop

} else if (NPCID == 527) { // helmet shop by Confusing Coder PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 57;
